title: European Union diplomatic communications 'targeted by hackers'
content: Thousands of messages in which diplomats discuss a range of subjects have reportedly been intercepted.

title: Elon Musk unveils prototype high-speed LA transport tunnel
content: The entrepreneur says his system will see modified electric cars travel at high speed underground.

title: Six baby seals found decapitated in New Zealand bay
content: Wildlife officials think the seals were killed elsewhere before being dumped from a boat.

title: Softbank phone shares flop on debut
content: Shares in Softbank's mobile unit fall 14.5% on first day of trading on the Tokyo Stock Market.

title: Vanuatu uses drones to deliver vaccines to remote island
content: Vital medicines are flown to a remote Vanuatu village in what will now become a regular service.

title: Belgium's PM Charles Michel submits resignation amid migration row
content: Charles Michel's resignation letter comes days after a coalition partner quit over migration.

title: Weather stops plastic waste car reaching South Pole
content: A car made from waste plastic has been forced to abort its mission to the South Pole because of bad weather.

title: The 'grandfamilies' finding a place of their own
content: Grandparents often step in when mums and dads can't. But a US experiment underlines the difference they can make.

title: Amphibian that buries head in sand named after Donald Trump
content: A newly discovered creature that buries its head in the sand is named Dermophis donaldtrumpi.
